title: Amine-functionalized polymer membrane for the electrochemical reduction of CO2 to hydrocarbons
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,4230-4242
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00896K, Paper
Abhishek Kumar, Leela Manohar Aeshala, Tapas Palai
Amine-functionalized solid polymer electrolyte membrane was synthesized. The faradaic efficiency of products CH4 and C2H6 were 13.77% and 23.05%, respectively.
